sense.def:
Money
so kovanci in bankovci, s katerimi kupujemo stvari, ali pa znesek, ki ga imamo na računu v banki.

seg.quote: I spent all my money on sweets.
They may not accept English money.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes money
, dobi denar kot plačilo za delo ali od dobička.

seg.quote: To make money you've got to take chances.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
gets one's money's worth
, dobi veliko za znesek, ki ga plača.

seg.quote: I always insist on getting my money's worth.
